items.title: Revival Rate Constraint
items.content:
855: :label: obs-revival-rate-constraint
856: 
857: In the two-state model, KL-non-expansiveness requires $\lambda_{\text{revive}} \le 1$.
858: 
859: **Physical interpretation**: Revival rate must not exceed the death rate (on average) for stability.
items.raw_directive:
852: **Conclusion**: If $\lambda \le 1$, contraction holds. If $\lambda > 1$, expansion!
